messages.title: A fresh start for Poplar and Limehouse
messages.content: If you elect me, I will stand up for you in Westminster, fighting for local people against Theresa May's hard Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focusing on building homes, stopping the sell-off of affordable homes and giving first-time buyers a 'first dibs' on new homes in their area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A sustainable future for the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guaranteed funding and stopping the Conservative's planned cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for our place in Europe
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing a hard Brexit, guaranteed rights for EU nationals and holding a referendum on the final Brexit deal.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposing a hard Brexit, guaranteed rights for EU nationals and holding a referendum on the final Brexit deal.
issues.health: Guaranteed funding and stopping the Conservative's planned cuts.

housing.content: Building homes, stopping the sell-off of affordable homes and giving first-time buyers a 'first dibs' on new homes in their area.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you elect me, I will stand up for you in Westminster, fighting for local people against Theresa May's hard Brexit

images.caption: Elaine Bagshaw and the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on local issues such as housing and the NHS, as well as the wider issue of Brexit. There is a strong emphasis on opposing the Conservatives and highlighting the division and loss of support within the Labour party.
